SKT_FIRST.name: Flight of Abraxas
SKT_FIRST.true_desc:
Attacks all enemies.
If it is the caster's turn, obtains <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>Desire to Dominate (Unique Resource)</color>.
Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> and Ignores <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> of the target's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.
<color=#28d9ed>Instantly kills</color> non-Boss enemies with <color=#28d9ed>2%</color> or less Health, ignores <color=#28d9ed>Immortality</color>.
deals greater damage to boss monsters.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp:
敵全体にダメージを与える。
自分のターンの場合、<color=#28d9ed>【固有資源:支配欲】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>獲得する。
このスキルは自分の<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほど与えるダメージがUPし、対象の防御力を <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>無視する。
また、ボスではない対象のHPが<color=#28d9ed>2%</color> 以下の場合、<color=#28d9ed>即死</color>効果を与え、その際<color=#28d9ed>不死</color> 効果を無視する.
ボスの場合、より大ダメージを与える。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr:
적 전체를 공격합니다.
자신의 턴이라면 <color=#28d9ed>고유 자원 : 지배욕</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 획득합니다.
이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>이 높을수록 피해가 증가하고, 방어력을 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 무시합니다. 
또한 보스가 아닌 대상의 체력이 <color=#28d9ed>2%</color> 이하인 경우 <color=#28d9ed>즉사</color>시키며 이 때 <color=#28d9ed>불사</color> 효과는 무시됩니다.
보스에게는 더 큰 피해를 입힙니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh:
攻击全体敌人。
若处于自身回合,则获得<color=#28d9ed>1个</color><color=#28d9ed>固有资源:统治欲</color>效果。
自身的<color=#28d9ed>生命值上限</color>越高,则该技能的伤害越高,방어력을 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 무시합니다. 
또한 보스가 아닌 대상의 체력이 <color=#28d9ed>2%</color> 이하인 경우 <color=#28d9ed>즉사</color>시키며 이 때 <color=#28d9ed>불사</color> 효과는 무시됩니다.
且对首领造成更高伤害。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Adds barrier (Proportional to Health)\nGains 1 additional Desire to Dominate
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: シールド追加\n(HPが高いほどシールド量UP)\n【支配欲】獲得量+1
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 额外护盾(根据生命值等比)\n统治欲获得量+1

SKT_BURST_2.effect:
Increases damage
Increase Defense for 2 turns
SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp:
ダメージUP
2ターンの間防御力UP
SKT_BURST_2.effect_zh:
伤害提升
2回合内提升防御力

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Extra Turn\nGains 4 additional Desire to Dominate
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 追加ターン\n【支配欲】追加獲得+4
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 额外回合\n额外获得统治欲 +4

SKT_SECOND.name: Merciless God
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
(Passive Effect) Immune to <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color>, <color=#28d9ed>Frozen</color>, <color=#28d9ed>Petrified</color>, and <color=#28d9ed>Priority Reduction</color>. Damage taken from single attacks is reduced by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
At the start of battle, grants self <color=#28d9ed>Selfish God</color>.
(Triggered Effect) Prepares the <color=#28d9ed>Revenge</color> effect for every <color=#28d9ed>cooldown cycle</color> of the skill.
Attacks all enemies and increases the caster's Priority by <color=#28d9ed>25%</color> when <color=#28d9ed>Revenge</color> is activated. This skill deals damage proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp:
(パッシブ効果)<color=#28d9ed>スタン</color>、<color=#28d9ed>凍結</color>、<color=#28d9ed>石化</color>、<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージDOWN</color>の影響を受けず、単体攻撃で受けるダメージを<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>DOWNさせる。
戦闘開始時、自身に<color=#28d9ed>身勝手な神</color>を付与する。
(発動効果)<color=#28d9ed>スキルターン</color>ごとに<color=#28d9ed>【復讐】</color>を発動する。
<color=#28d9ed>【復讐】</color>:敵全体にダメージを与え、自分の行動ゲージが<color=#28d9ed>25%</color>UPする。このスキルは自分の<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
(패시브 효과) <color=#28d9ed>스턴</color>, <color=#28d9ed>빙결</color>, <color=#28d9ed>석화</color>, <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지 감소</color>의 영향을 받지 않고, 단일 공격으로 받는 피해를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 감소시킵니다.
전투 시작시, 자신에게 <color=#28d9ed>이기적인 신</color>을 부여합니다.
(발동 효과) 스킬의 <color=#28d9ed>쿨타임</color>마다 <color=#28d9ed>복수</color> 효과를 준비합니다.
<color=#28d9ed>복수</color> 발동 시 적 전체를 공격하고 자신의 행동 게이지가 <color=#28d9ed>25%</color> 증가합니다. 이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>이 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh:
(被动效果)不受<color=#28d9ed>晕眩</color>、<color=#28d9ed>冰冻</color>、<color=#28d9ed>石化</color>、<color=#28d9ed>行动值降低</color>效果的影响,并使因单体攻击受到的伤害降低<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。
战斗开始时,为自身赋予<color=#28d9ed>自私之神</color>。
(触发效果)每当技能处于<color=#28d9ed>冷却时间</color>时,<color=#28d9ed>复仇</color>效果待触发。
<color=#28d9ed>复仇</color>效果生效时,攻击全体敌人,并使自身行动值提升<color=#28d9ed>25%</color>。自身<color=#28d9ed>生命值上限</color>越高,则该技能的伤害越高。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: The World Is Mine
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: ワールド・イズ・マイン
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc:
<color=#28d9ed>Requires 5 Desire to Dominate (Unique Resource) to use this skill.</color>
Attacks all enemies, and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Petrified</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. The Petrified effect ignores Resilience.
Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> and ignores <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> of the target's Defense.\nInstantly kills non-Boss enemies with <color=#28d9ed>2%</color> or less Health, ignores <color=#28d9ed>Immortality</color>.\n Deals greater damage to Bosses and ignores <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> of their Defense
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp:
このスキルは<color=#28d9ed>【固有資源:支配欲】が5個ある場合、使用できる。</color>
敵全体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>石化</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。石化は対象の効果抵抗を無視する。
このスキルは自分の<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPし、ボスの場合、より大ダメージを与える。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr:
<color=#28d9ed>고유 자원 : 지배욕 5개 보유 시 사용 가능합니다.</color>
적 전체를 공격하고, <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>석화</color>를 부여합니다. 석화 효과는 대상의 효과 저항을 무시합니다.
이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>이 높을수록 피해가 증가하고, 방어력을 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 무시합니다.
또한 보스가 아닌 대상의 체력이 <color=#28d9ed>2%</color> 이하인 경우 <color=#28d9ed>즉사</color>시키며 이 때 <color=#28d9ed>불사</color> 효과는 무시됩니다.
대상이 보스인 경우 더 큰 피해를 입히고 방어력을 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 무시합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh:
<color=#28d9ed>持有5个固有资源:统治欲时可以使用。</color>
攻击全体敌人,并造成<color=#28d9ed>石化</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。石化效果无视目标的效果抵抗。
自身的<color=#28d9ed>生命值上限</color>越高,则该技能的伤害越高,且对首领造成更高伤害。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, deals <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage to the target. \n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、対象に最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>の固定ダメージを与える。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>が<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPする。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 대상에게 대상 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 만큼의 고정 피해를 입힙니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 회복합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携收尾效果</color>:攻击后,对目标造成相当于其生命值上限<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>的固定伤害。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,使<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>恢复<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage

4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
